quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.text: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.text: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
quotes.author: Christian D. Larson

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Be not afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living, and your belief will help create the fact.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.text: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.text: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsleigh

quotes.text: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: Success is not just about making money. It's about making a difference.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Every morning brings new potential, but only if you take the first step.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.
quotes.author: Jordan Belfort

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: You can't use up your creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.text: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.text: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.text: It is not what you do for your children, but what you have taught them to do for themselves, that will make them successful human beings.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.text: The only way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker
